footer.DESCRIPTION: The best directory website template for showcasing your projects, tools, and resources with style and functionality.
footer.DISCLAIMER: All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners. All company, product, and service names used in this repository, related repositories, and associated websites are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement, affiliation, or sponsorship. This directory may include content generated by artificial intelligence (AI)

help.PAGE_SUBTITLE: Complete step-by-step guide to install, configure, and use Ever Works directory platform. Everything you need to launch your directory in minutes.
help.SUPPORT_DESC: Get help when you need it
help.NEED_HELP_DESC: Can't find what you're looking for? We're here to help!
help.COMMUNITY_DESC: Join our Discord community for support
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME: How long does it take to set up?
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME_ANSWER: With our quick start guide, you can have Ever Works running in under 10 minutes.
help.FAQ_CODING_EXPERIENCE_ANSWER: Basic knowledge of web development helps, but our detailed guides make it accessible to beginners.
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN_ANSWER: Yes! Ever Works is built with Tailwind CSS and offers extensive customization options.
help.FAQ_HOSTING_ANSWER: We recommend Vercel for the best performance, but Ever Works works with any Node.js hosting provider.
help.HERO_SUBTITLE: The best directory boilerplate, packed with
help.HERO_SUBTITLE_FEATURES: Submission, CMS, Blog, Authentication, Newsletter, SEO, Themes and more.
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_STEP1_DESC: Clone the repository, customize the website.
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_STEP2_DESC: Deploy the project to your preferred platform.
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_STEP3_DESC: Manage the content through Supabase dashboard and built-in CMS.
help.TECH_STACK_SUBTITLE: Built with the most trusted and performant technologies in the industry
help.TECH_STACK_READY_DESC: Start with our production-ready stack and launch your directory in minutes
help.MONETIZATION_SECTION_SUBTITLE: Multiple revenue streams built-in to help you generate income from day one
help.MONETIZATION_AFFILIATION_DESC: Earn commissions by promoting relevant products and services to your directory visitors
help.MONETIZATION_PAID_SUBMISSION_DESC: Charge for premium listings with enhanced visibility and additional features
help.MONETIZATION_SPONSORED_ADS_DESC: Display targeted advertisements and sponsored content throughout your directory
help.INSTALLATION_GUIDE_SUBTITLE: Step by step guide to install the project
help.INSTALLATION_STEP1_DESC: Start by cloning the Ever Works repository to your local machine.
help.INSTALLATION_STEP2_DESC: Install all required dependencies using your preferred package manager.
help.INSTALLATION_STEP3_DESC: Copy the environment example file and configure your variables.
help.INSTALLATION_STEP4_DESC: Configure your Supabase database and run migrations.
help.INSTALLATION_STEP5_DESC: Launch the development server and start building your directory.
help.INSTALLATION_TIP1_DESC: Faster and more efficient than npm
help.INSTALLATION_TIP3_DESC: Hot reload and detailed error messages
help.USAGE_GUIDE_SUBTITLE: Learn how to use and customize Ever Works for your directory
help.USAGE_CREATING_ITEMS_DESC: Learn how to add and manage items in your directory
help.USAGE_CREATING_ITEMS_TEXT: Navigate to the admin dashboard and click "Add New Item" to create a new directory entry. Fill in the required fields and configure the item settings.
help.USAGE_CUSTOMIZING_DESIGN_DESC: Personalize your directory with custom themes and branding
help.USAGE_CUSTOMIZING_DESIGN_TEXT: Ever Works comes with a powerful theming system built on Tailwind CSS. You can customize colors, fonts, and layouts to match your brand.
help.USAGE_MANAGING_USERS_DESC: Handle user authentication, roles, and permissions
help.USAGE_MANAGING_USERS_TEXT: Ever Works includes a complete authentication system with support for multiple providers. You can manage user roles and permissions through the admin dashboard.
help.USAGE_PAYMENTS_SETUP_DESC: Configure Stripe for paid submissions and premium features
help.USAGE_PAYMENTS_SETUP_TEXT: Ever Works integrates with Stripe for handling payments. Configure your Stripe keys in the environment variables and set up your pricing plans.
help.USAGE_DEPLOYMENT_DESC: Deploy your directory to production with Vercel or other platforms
help.USAGE_DEPLOYMENT_TEXT: Ever Works is optimized for deployment on Vercel, but can be deployed to any platform that supports Next.js.
help.USAGE_BEST_PRACTICE_1_DESC: Always backup your database before major updates
help.USAGE_BEST_PRACTICE_2_DESC: Keep your environment variables secure and rotate keys regularly
help.USAGE_BEST_PRACTICE_3_DESC: Optimize images and use caching for better performance
help.USAGE_BEST_PRACTICE_4_DESC: Monitor your directory's performance with built-in analytics
help.TECH_NEXTJS_DESC: Full stack React framework for production
help.TECH_TYPESCRIPT_DESC: Typed superset of JavaScript for better development
help.TECH_TAILWIND_DESC: CSS framework for rapid UI development
help.TECH_HEROUI_DESC: Modern React component library for building UIs
help.TECH_SUPABASE_DESC: Open source Firebase alternative with PostgreSQL
help.TECH_STRIPE_DESC: Best and most secure online payment service
help.TECH_ZUSTAND_DESC: Small, fast and scalable state management
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_DESCRIPTION: Simple setup process to launch your directory website in minutes
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_ENV_DESC: Technical configuration for external services (API keys, URLs, secrets)
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_ENV_DATABASE_DESC: Project URL and database access keys
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_ENV_OAUTH_DESC: Keys for Google, GitHub, Facebook, etc.
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_CONFIG_AI_DESC: Automatic generation, search limits, relevance thresholds
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_CONFIG_ADVANCED_DESC: Minimum content length, max pages to process
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP2_DESC: Add your API keys and secrets
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_CTA_DESC: Get your directory up and running in less than 10 minutes
